attributes.action: Graeme, Alan and Matthew to become leaders of the World
attributes.additional_details: It's time for a change in world politics. Sign this petition to allow a panel of world leaders who can overlook all the wrong doings, in all countries. Our manifest includes the slashing of all alcohol tax worldwide. Mandatory Gaming classes introduced to schools, and making the Blue Lagoon Chippy a 5 star worldwide restaurant. Above all, we will halt selfish politicians lining their pockets, and give the planet back to the working class. Those on benefits will be shipped to the moon.
